Hope you'll enjoy this new functionality.
Happy Painting!

title: Oil Painting Color by Number - April Coloring

creator: Crimson Pine Games
descriptionHtml:
Colour by numbers app that is completely unique - colour with swipes instead of taps. You are unlocking more paintings while leveling up, and we’re not hiding any tiny spots to colour from you (no magnifying glass needed!). It is all you would want out of an oil paint by numbers for adults app and more!

Besides making your painting realistic, April Coloring provides you with top-notch handcrafted free content and overall premium colouring book app quality, to help you become a more relaxed and creative person. To make sure that April Coloring colouring book brings you realistic experience and relaxation, we focused on user experience, simplicity and great community around the colour by numbers app!

WHY USE APRIL - OIL PAINT BY NUMBERS FOR ADULTS APP

● We know you appreciate colouring activities and probably you are using plenty of other colouring pages and colour by numbers apps. What we wanted to excite you with is a completely unique approach towards the way colouring feels. Just download the oil paint by numbers for adults app and check it out yourself!
● We want to make things easier for you. Just tap on the palette and you will find the right spot instantly. You may also tap on any spot on the main colouring board and you will highlight all required fields to paint the colour number needed.
● Almost all content is free - unlockable while gathering more colouring experience (stars) and leveling up or collecting coins. This makes the whole experience a lot more fun!
● There is a daily content posted within the app - make sure you claim colouring pages regularly - otherwise past dailies are available only for users which subscribed!
● If you subscribe you will receive plenty of goodies - exclusive colouring pages content, access to past dailies and all ads will be removed. On top you will support our team as we’re not treating April Coloring as a one-off but a long term project to innovate the colouring evergreen!
● April Coloring colouring book is highly optimized for Apple Pencil. Check all the features that you can benefit from - including pressure and angle sensitivity / double tapping and more!

People all over the world are already enjoying our unique way of colouring – with over 1 000 000 paintings painted each month! Join them!

If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com
descriptionShort: Colour with swipes, not taps. Paint by Numbers app. Colouring book for adults.

Colour by numbers app that is completely unique - colour with swipes instead of taps. You are unlocking more paintings while leveling up, and we’re not hiding any tiny spots to colour from you (no magnifying glass needed!). It is all you would want out of an oil paint by numbers for adults app and more!

Besides making your painting realistic, April Coloring provides you with top-notch handcrafted free content and overall premium colouring book app quality, to help you become a more relaxed and creative person. To make sure that April Coloring brings you realistic experience and relaxation, we focused on user experience, simplicity and great community around the colour by numbers app!

WHY USE APRIL - OIL PAINT BY NUMBERS FOR ADULTS APP

● We know you appreciate colouring activities and probably you are using plenty of other colour by numbers apps. What we wanted to excite you with is a completely unique approach towards the way colouring feels. Just download the oil paint by numbers for adults app and check it out yourself!
● We want to make things easier for you. Just tap on the palette and you will find the right spot instantly. You may also tap on any spot on the main colouring board and you will highlight all required fields to paint the colour number needed.
● Almost all content is free - unlockable while gathering more colouring experience (stars) and leveling up or collecting coins. This makes the whole experience a lot more fun!
● There is a daily content posted within the app - make sure you claim colouring pages regularly - otherwise past dailies are available only for users which subscribed!
● If you subscribe you will receive plenty of goodies - exclusive colouring pages content, access to past dailies and all ads will be removed. On top you will support our team as we’re not treating April Coloring as a one-off but a long term project to innovate the colouring evergreen!

People all over the world are already enjoying our unique way of colouring – with over 1 000 000 paintings each month! Join them!

If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com

Colour by numbers app that is completely unique - colour with swipes instead of taps. You are unlocking more paintings while leveling up, and we’re not hiding any tiny spots to colour from you (no magnifying glass needed!). It is all you would want out of an oil paint by numbers for adults app and more!

Besides making your painting realistic, April Coloring provides you with top-notch handcrafted free content and overall premium colouring book app quality, to help you become a more relaxed and creative person. To make sure that April Coloring brings you realistic experience and relaxation, we focused on user experience, simplicity and great community around the colour by numbers app!

WHY USE APRIL - OIL PAINT BY NUMBERS FOR ADULTS APP

● We know you appreciate colouring activities and probably you are using plenty of other colour by numbers apps. What we wanted to excite you with is a completely unique approach towards the way colouring feels. Just download the oil paint by numbers for adults app and check it out yourself!
● We want to make things easier for you. Just tap on the palette and you will find the right spot instantly. You may also tap on any spot on the main colouring board and you will highlight all required fields to paint the colour number needed.
● Almost all content is free - unlockable while gathering more colouring experience (stars) and leveling up or collecting coins. This makes the whole experience a lot more fun!
● There is a daily content posted within the app - make sure you claim colouring pages regularly - otherwise past dailies are available only for users which subscribed!
● If you subscribe you will receive plenty of goodies - exclusive colouring pages content, access to past dailies and all ads will be removed. On top you will support our team as we’re not treating April Coloring as a one-off but a long term project to innovate the colouring evergreen!

People all over the world are already enjoying our unique way of colouring – with over 1 000 000 paintings each month! Join them!

If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com

If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com

descriptionHtml:
Colour by numbers app that is completely unique - colour with swipes instead of taps. You are unlocking more paintings while leveling up, and we’re not hiding any tiny spots to colour from you (no magnifying glass needed!). It is all you would want out of an oil paint by numbers for adults app and more!

Besides making your painting realistic, April Coloring provides you with top-notch handcrafted free content and overall premium colouring book app quality, to help you become a more relaxed and creative person. To make sure that April Coloring brings you realistic experience and relaxation, we focused on user experience, simplicity and great community around the colour by numbers app!

WHY USE APRIL - OIL PAINT BY NUMBERS FOR ADULTS APP

● We know you appreciate colouring activities and probably you are using plenty of other colour by numbers apps. What we wanted to excite you with is a completely unique approach towards the way colouring feels. Just download the oil paint by numbers for adults app and check it out yourself!
● We want to make things easier for you. Just tap on the palette and you will find the right spot instantly. You may also tap on any spot on the main colouring board and you will highlight all required fields to paint the colour number needed.
● Almost all content is free - unlockable while gathering more colouring experience (stars) and leveling up or collecting coins. This makes the whole experience a lot more fun!
● There is a daily content posted within the app - make sure you claim colouring pages regularly - otherwise past dailies are available only for users which subscribed!
● If you subscribe you will receive plenty of goodies - exclusive colouring pages content, access to past dailies and all ads will be removed. On top you will support our team as we’re not treating April Coloring as a one-off but a long term project to innovate the colouring evergreen!

People all over the world are already enjoying our unique way of colouring – with over 1 000 000 paintings each month! Join them!

If you see anything we can improve, please, let us know! New reviews and support emails are really helpful to make our app better and smarter! Contact us via april@crimsonpine.com
